description: Try our easy to follow Butterflied Mackerel With Sweet Potato & Beetroot Pickle recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fish dishes,Pescatarian,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Butterflied Mackerel With Sweet Potato & Beetroot Pickle Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 medium to large ready-cooked unpickled beetroots, diced

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the sweet potato in a pan of boiling salted water for 3-5 minutes until just beginning to soften; do not overcook. Drain, and allow to cool.
Preheat the grill to high. Sit the mackerel on an oiled baking tray, and grill for 3-4 minutes on each side until cooked through.
Meanwhile, to make the pickle, gently mix together the sweet potato and beetroot, then stir through the onion and onion seeds. Squeeze over the orange juice, and stir until everything is coated.
Serve the mackerel hot, with a little of the sweet potato and beetroot pickle, or serve the pickle separately in a dish for everyone to help themselves.
